title: Product of Row and Column Vector
text: To multiply a row and column vector, multiply the corresponding components in the row vector by the same component in the column vector. Then, add the components together.

title: Dot product
text: The product of a row $$n-vector$$ and column $$n-vector$$ is the same formula as the dot product of the row vector transposed and the column vector.

title: Transpose
text: A matrix transpose is when a column vector is turned into a row vector, or vice versa.

title: Limitations
text: We can only multiply a row and column if they have the same number of components.

title: Dimensions of Row Vector
text: What is the dimension of the row vector?

title: Dimensions of Column Vector
text: What is the dimension of the column vector?
